item.title: Insomniacâ€™s X-Men Game Has a Big Choice to Make if It Includes Magneto
item.description:
Even though nothing has been officially announced yet, many Marvel fans are eagerly anticipating Insomniac's upcoming X-Men game. Allegedly releasing by 2030, Insomniac is set to finally let players explore the titular team, and the potential alone is extremely exciting. But, as the release date nears, the studio will have one major decision regarding X-Men 's version of the team's greatest adversary, Magneto.

For years, Magneto has been constantly at odds with the X-Men team. He has been the villainous face they have fought against through many of the live-action films, has constantly butted heads with them in comics, and his dynamic with Charles Xavier has formed the backbone of the franchise. Yet, Marvel Studio's first foray into the team has made the iconic Mutant the leader of the X-Men rather than its enemy, which has made for some great television. And these drastically different adaptations have seemingly left Insomniac with a pretty hard decision as it forges ahead with its own X-Men adventure.

Insomniac's Version of Magneto Has Many Incarnations to Draw From

Magneto Was the X-Men's Biggest Adversary For Years

While Magneto has played many roles in the comics, the general audiences' perception of him has been as a villainous figure since Fox's first X-Men film in 2000. In that trilogy, Magneto constantly fought back against the titular team through a variety of different schemes. X-Men saw him attempt to mutate the leaders of the world, X2 originally sees him ally with the team before attempting to take out humanity, and X-Men: The Last Stand sees him go to war against humanity's attempt to create a cure. Through every film, it has been up to the X-Men to stop him while they also fight back against humans that wish to do them harm.

The X-Men prequel trilogy presented a bit of a different dynamic with Magneto and the team, but he was still ultimately an adversary by the end of it. The only films where he was on their side for the majority of the story were First Class and Days of Future Past , yet even in those films he would be at odds with the team eventually. Because of that, many viewers have seen him as the X-Men's greatest villain for years. However, X-Men '97 has changed that.

X-Men '97 Has Taken Magneto in a Different Direction

Instead of having him be a villain, X-Men '97 has seen him take charge of the team after Professor X perished in the original series. This has given him a completely new dynamic with the team, with many of them being forced to learn how to work alongside him after spending years fighting against him. Additionally, it means that he must learn how to follow Charles Xavier's ideals, even if it pains him to do so. That story has made for some fantastic television, with many regarding it as one of the best things Marvel has done in years.

It also means that Insomniac will be facing a major decision with its version of Magneto. The studio could simply follow in the footsteps of a lot of X-Men media and have him be the villain once more, or it could follow X-Men '97 's example by having him be more of an anti-hero. If neither of those approaches interest it, then it could attempt to do something completely new with the character, as it has done with Spider-Man. As long as it makes sense within the context of the character, many things could be rich storytelling veins.

Since Magneto is such a major part of the X-Men canon, he will likely show up in some fashion in Marvel's X-Men . There is also a chance that he appears first in Marvel's Wolverine , as that will probably start setting up what is to come. Fans will just have to wait and see just what the studio has planned, but based on its previous Marvel projects, it seems like he will be in good hands.

item.title: Roblox: Skibi Defense 3.5 Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Skibi Defence 3.5 is one of the best Roblox tower defense games based on the Skibidi toilets meme. In addition to the exciting gameplay and interesting units, the game even has a storyline campaign, so you won't get bored. At first, collecting Credits for solid units will be difficult, but you can get a lot of currency for free by redeeming Skibi Defence 3.5 codes.

Updated July 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We have added a new code that will give you 2000 Shards. Take advantage of these limited-time offers to get an edge in the game.

All Skibi Defense 3.5 Codes

How to Redeem Skibi Defense 3.5 Codes

Skibi Defence 3.5 has a rather unusual method of redeeming codes that can confuse many players. Therefore, we have prepared a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Skibi Defence 3.5 .

  • Open Roblox and launch Skibi Defence 3.5 .
  • Click the chat button in the upper left corner of the screen.
  • Paste the code from our list into the field and send this message. After that, a message about the code's successful redemption will appear at the top of the screen.

item.title: Roblox: Bike Race Simulator Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Bike Race Simulator is one of the Roblox titles that is perfect for players tired of classic racing. In it, you have to train and use different pets to become stronger and win races. You can use Bike Race Simulator codes to significantly speed up your progress from the first minutes of the game.

As with other titles on the platform, these codes will reward you with various free goodies. It includes both Wins and various boosters. But you should use them as soon as possible before they expire.

Updated July 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We have updated this article and added some new codes. Redeem them to get plenty of boosts. It can speed up your gameplay a lot.

All Bike Race Simulator Codes

The gameplay of Bike Race Simulator is basic, as you just need to click quickly to ride at maximum speed during the race. However, this is not enough to win. Thanks to pets and training, your opponents have a much higher top speed. To get closer to them at a faster speed, we recommend using codes in Bike Race Simulator .

Each of these codes will reward you with useful items. It's important to note that boosters are activated immediately after using the code, so you won't be able to postpone it. For your convenience, we have collected all the working Bike Race Simulator codes below.

Active Codes

  • sORryY - Redeem this code to get a Double Wins Boost (30m) (NEW)
  • WEVBSD - Redeem this code to get a Double Wins Boost (1h) (NEW)
  • ICNXNH - Redeem this code to get a +50% Wins Boost (1h) (NEW)
  • CXOWUX - Redeem this code to get a +50% Wins Boost (1h) (NEW)
  • 12000LiKeX_Real - Redeem this code to get a Double Wins Boost (1h) (NEW)
  • 5000LiKes_WoO - Redeem this code to get a Double Wins Boost (30m) (NEW)
  • boost - Redeem this code to get Double Training Boost (30m)
  • XUZOMW - Redeem this code to get a +50% Wins Boost (1h)
  • QUDNAL - Redeem this code to get Luck Boost for Eggs (1h)
  • TBMGNX - Redeem this code to get a +50% Wins Boost (1h)
  • 100LiKeS_NiCE - Redeem this code to get a Double Wins Boost (1h)
  • release - Redeem this code to get 500 Wins

Expired Codes

  • happyhalloween - Redeem this code to get a Double Training Boost (30m)

How to Redeem Codes in Bike Race Simulator

As you can see, these codes can bring you precious rewards. Luckily, they are straightforward to use. So, to redeem codes in Bike Race Simulator, you need to follow these simple steps:

  1. Launch Bike Race Simulator .
  2. Among the variety of icons on the right side of the screen, find the ones with tickets and click on it.
  3. Then, enter one of the codes above and click OK.

If you did everything correctly and the code is still active, you will see a message about receiving your rewards. Otherwise, the game will report that your code has expired or was entered incorrectly.

item.title: Roblox: Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong Codes
  • How to Redeem Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong Codes
  • How to Get More Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong Codes

Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong is one of the many Tycoon titles on Roblox . Therefore, your main task will be to craft and sell guns to earn Cash and upgrade your production. At first, though, your budget will be tiny, which is why many players opt to use Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong codes. Each of these Roblox codes can provide you with different rewards â€” mostly Cash but sometimes Guns, too, so you should redeem them as soon as possible.

Updated July 18, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We've thoroughly searched for Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong codes, but it seems the developers haven't released any yet. Keep checking back for future updates.

All Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong Codes

Working Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong Codes

  • JOINED - Redeem this code to get 150 Cash
  • GUNS - Redeem this code to get 19 Cash and 75 Guns

Expired Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong Codes

  • RELEASE
  • BASEMENT
  • OPTIMIZATION

As befits the genre, Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong has fairly straightforward gameplay. You craft Guns, sell them, and then upgrade your production. It costs quite a lot of Cash though, which is difficult to earn in large quantities at first. That's why Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong codes are so useful. By using them at the beginning of the game, you can immediately get Cash to hire workers and purchase several upgrades. However, like all codes, they are active for a limited time, so players should use them as quickly as possible before they expire.

How to Redeem Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong Codes

Fortunately, using Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong codes is as easy as it is in other Roblox titles. All you have to do is follow these steps:

  • First, launch Sell â€‹â€‹Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong .
  • Then click on the button with the ABX icon on the right side of the screen.
  • After that, enter one of the codes and click the Redeem button.
  • If you do everything correctly, you will see a message indicating you received your free rewards.

How to Get More Sell Guns and Prove Da Hood Wrong Codes

To ensure you get all the new Roblox codes, you should bookmark this guide, as we'll update it as soon as new codes are released. Another option is to visit the social media pages of the developers to see all the newly released codes and news about the game:

  • Best Tycoon Studio Discord Server

item.title: Remnant 2: How to Use The Cargo Control Key
item.description:
There's an overwhelming amount of secrets in Remnant 2 , and players don't even have to leave the confines of Ward 13 to encounter their first major one. Curious explorers might have already noticed that there's more to this safe zone than meets the eye, and one well-hidden weapon can be acquired if players are observant enough.

This secret involves the Cargo Control Key, an item that players won't be able to just stumble upon as they explore Remnant 2 's alien worlds. It goes to a very specific lock within Ward 13 itself, and thankfully, it's not too complicated to reach.

Updated July 18, 2024 by Marc Santos: Despite the many updates Remnant 2 has received since launch, the Cargo Control Key and its associated secret has remained untouched, and all information contained within this guide remains accurate and relevant. However, we've updated this piece to contain a couple of things players may want to know about the Cargo Control Key as well as the item tied to it in hopes of providing additional information.

Remnant 2 Cargo Control Key Location (& How to Use It)

The Cargo Control Key is tucked away inside the locked chest in Ford's office, which is directly above the small workshop area next to the Worldstone. Players will be able to get to this chest at any time after finishing the tutorial and subsequent Ward 13 tour section.

To get the key, players need to inspect the bottom of the flashlight that Ford gives them at the start of the game. The code here is usually 0415 â€” this seems to be constant in almost every new playthrough, but the possibility of it changing in future versions of Remnant 2 remains. Input the code into Ford's safe to get the Cargo Control Key.

As for where to use the Cargo Control Key, players need to go inside the derelict freight ship by the dock in Ward 13. From the Worldstone, take the exit to Brabus' firing range and go past the fenced area with all the shipping containers. There is a path here that leads to the inside of the ship that's blocked by a locked door. Interact with this door and select the Cargo Control Key from the inventory menu that pops up to unlock the room.

What's In The Freight Ship?

On the table inside the locked room is the MP60-R SMG, a returning weapon from the original game that functions more or less the same as it did previously. It's a fully-automatic sidearm that might as well be a primary weapon. It comes with the following base stats:

  • Damage: 9
  • RPS: 14.2
  • Magazine: 42

The MP60-R SMG is an excellent secondary weapon for a class like the Hunter in Remnant 2 , especially early in the game where your choices of weapons are fairly limited. This gun fires extremely rapidly, which means Status Effect mods like Hot Shot will be more effective as the fast fire rate allows for quicker abnormal status build-up. However, the SMG's poor accuracy makes it ineffective at range, and its high ammo consumption makes it somewhat inefficient unless used with mods or other effects that buff damage.
